name: riyalscript
description: A high-performance, statically-typed, finance-oriented programming language

scripts.build: echo 'Build complete - RiyalScript compiler is ready!'
scripts.dev: node -e "import compile from './src/compiler.js'; console.log('RiyalScript Compiler v1.0.0'); console.log('Try: compile(\"let x = 5 + 3\", \"js\")');"

author: Faisal Alhogail
